column4: i have a strange issue. it seems like there is a permanent reference to adobe-flash-$old-version. other browsers are using the newer plugin but firefox still uses the old one.
have you tried doing a "locate libflashplayerplugin.so" in the terminal
locate libflashp gave me a few locations. i located the ones close to the releasedate of $old-version and removed the culprit.... working now, thnx for the hint :)
